title: Intensive Workshop on Threshold Concepts in Science Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific research methodology and information retrieval experience
context.additional_context: Customized training for corporate R&D managers integrating smartphone-based VR simulation and offline workshops: Focus on enhancing scientific decision-making through improved information evaluation/utilization competencies

learning_goals: Real-time VR simulations can apply science information credibility evaluation criteria with over 80% accuracy
Using online learning modules provided in a flipped learning format, learners can explain three or more research paper search strategies
Through project-based assessment, learners can create an information utilization report applying threshold concepts to real-world work scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
